scripts.network: npm run build:happ && concurrently -k "UI_PORT=1420 npm start -w ui" "npm run launch"
scripts.test: hc app pack workdir && npm run test --workspace tests
scripts.network:tauri: hc sandbox clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=$(get-port) concurrently "npm run start --workspace ui" "npm run launch:tauri" "hc playground"
scripts.launch:tauri: concurrently "kitsune2-bootstrap-srv --listen "127.0.0.1:$BOOTSTRAP_PORT"" "echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/summon-shopper.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:"$BOOTSTRAP_PORT" webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:"$BOOTSTRAP_PORT""
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package --workspace ui && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc dna pack dnas/cart/workdir && hc app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:zomes: CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --workspace --exclude summon-shopper-tauri && mkdir -p ../summon/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release && cp target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/*.wasm ../summon/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/
scripts.network:android: npm run build:happ && concurrently -k "UI_PORT=1420 npm start -w ui" "npm run tauri dev" "npm run tauri android dev"
